description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Ever want to draw 8 Bit Art and then share it with the world OR smash it to pieces?  Now you can.  Defeat every level of FaceBreaker and design your own custom levels and share them with the world.  Download new and exciting levels daily from other users and play them, rate them, and break their faces !!   Beat the game for bonus items and unlock the origins of FaceBreaker.   All rights reserved.
